catalog_metadata.name: ICP cluster v312 on IBM Cloud
catalog_metadata.description: Deploys ICP 3.1.2 cluster on IBM Cloud, loads the MCM docker images and deploys the MCM Klusterlet
catalog_metadata.longDescription: Deploys ICP 3.1.2 cluster on IBM Cloud, loads the MCM docker images and deploys the MCM Klusterlet to make this a managed cluster.
